Goblin supports any image type supported by XNA.

You don't need to set DrawBackground to true.

Are you sure you adding your panel to the scene correctly?

I just tried to simply add a texture in Tutorial 3 by adding the following code right after line 160 (frame.Border = ....)

frame.Texture = Content.Load("brick_wall_14");

And this works perfectly fine.

Note that the brick wall texture is in the /data/Textures folder.
